name: 2048 Sumi-E
description:
This game was made as a 2nd year exercise at ETPA Toulouse - France.

The prompt was : "Make a 2048 game with an emphasis on visual and audio feedback"

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

How to play :

- Use the arrow keys to move the pieces across the board

- Only pieces with the same value and adjacent to each other will combine

Music - "Mysterious Kyoto" by MOJI :
